display_long_description:
Flipside is the metaverse social media platform for next-gen creators and their fans.

Watch a steady stream of spatial content, which you can like, subscribe, share, and even remix. Connect with friends over multiplayer and watch together!

Next-gen creators make spatial recordings using Flipside’s built-in virtual TV studio, then share them to your channel and build a fanbase of subscribers.

# Highlights:

- Browse, watch, like, share and subscribe to other Flipside creators
- Remix other creators' posts, where you can replace characters with yourself
- Send direct messages to connect with your friends and share content
- Record full 3D spatial recordings, including motion capture, voice, props, music and more
- An ever-growing catalog of built-in characters, props and sets
- Generate custom characters with built-in Ready Player Me integration
- Generate teleprompter scripts and custom sets using AI tools
- Show tools including cameras, camera switcher, teleprompters, slideshow, and more
- Audio controller to add music and special effects, including a built-in audio library or import your own
- Use our companion Flipside Broadcaster app for PC to capture 2D content for other social platforms
- Use our Flipside Creator Tools plugin for Unity to import your own custom characters, props, and sets
- And too many features to list them all

Download Flipside today!
